metadata.title: CVE-2024-35868 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: smb:client: fix potential UAF in cifs_stats_proc_write() Skip sessions that arebeing teared down (status == SES_EXITING) to avoid UAF.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
